reviewText: This was a great documentary about Maryland Crab Culture. There is a segment on steamed crabs, and the second segment is on the best crab cakes. I got mad at myself for watching it too early in the season -- it will make you VERY hungry. Please watch this only during crab season or when you will be able to get some Chesapeake Bay Blue Crabs!
I love crabs and this is the best book on the subject ever !!
great great dvd. I learned so much about eating crabs. I loved this dvd so much i went out a bought a bunch of crabs and enjoyed each one. i loved the seller.
